full SPINN.from sentence: Our optimized C ++/ CUDA models and the Theano source code for the full SPINN are available at https://github.com / stanfordnlp/spinn. 30 tokens or fewer .

fix.from sentence: We fix the model dimension D and the word embedding dimension at 300 .

CPU performance test.from sentence: We run the CPU performance test on a 2.20 GHz 16 core Intel Xeon E5-2660 processor with hyperthreading enabled .

NVIDIA Titan X GPU.from sentence: We test our thin - stack implementation and the RNN model on an NVIDIA Titan X GPU .
